title: Gallic War 5 37 - Petrosidius threw the standard

content.question: It can be inferred from lines 8-10 (Ex quibus... occiditur) that Petrosidius threw the standard in order to

choices.label: keep it from being captured by the enemy
expedite his escape from the enemy
direct his comrades toward the battlefront
signal that the Romans were prepared to surrender

content.answer: keep it from being captured by the enemy
